website_summaries.verdict: Contains natural ingredients in a liquid formula that you can mix with the cat's food or place directly into the cat's mouth.
pros: Helps to prevent urinary tract infections, meaning you'll need to administer antibiotics less often
Product is made in the United States
Seems to work more quickly than some other types of supplements
cons: Cats may not like the taste, and some cats may have stomach problems after eating it

website_summaries.verdict: If you need quick results for your suffering cat and money is no object, then it’s hard not to recommend this tasty and effective urinary supplement featuring high levels of nourishing cranberry, sea shell-based glucosamine, and vitamin C.
pros: Cranberry juice extract, glucosamine, vitamin C, and herbal extract are the first 4 active ingredients
Easy to blend into food or water
Treats a wide range of urinary tract ailments
cons: A potent, but especially expensive urinary system supplement

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of blood in my cat's urine
customer_reviews.text: My kitty had blood in her urine. We were tight on money so I decided to try this before taking her to the vet. It worked. I mixed it in her food twice a day and I didn't see any more blood in about 10 days. I continued giving it to her for two months just to make sure. The ingredients are natural, so nothing to lose.
customer_reviews.author: Charo

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: If my dog had been indicating any type of pain I would have gone to the vet. As it was she was constantly straining to pee more. After about 3 or 4 days of the recommended dosage she was back to her normal one and done. Saved me a ton in vet fees and probably unnecessary antibiotics.
customer_reviews.author: sherri

customer_reviews.title: Possibly saved my Tigger's life.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work very well for my Tigger, who has had extremely painful and possibly deadly urinary blockages. Since we started using UroMaxx he has not had these problems, for which we are extremely grateful. We almost lost Tigger about a year ago due to a blocked urethra. The vet had to drain his bladder with a needle, and insert a catheter for a day. Then for two weeks we had to medicate him, and he was in terrible pain. With a change in food and the use of UroMAXX, so far we have avoided a repeat. Well worth the minor added expense.
customer_reviews.author: David Strom

customer_reviews.title: Clears up Mystery Urinary Problem
customer_reviews.text: My cat didn't have blockages... Instead of going in the litterbox many times with very little urine, she went very FEW times with lots of urine! When she started going outside the litterbox, we took her to the vet -- she did not have any infections or indications of crystals, etc. I did notice a strange strong (not ammonia) smell. After two daily doses of UroMAXX, that cleared up, and she stopped going outside the box. Too much of it seems to lessen her output, so I have adjusted her dose down (she is also underweight). Oh, and she loves the 'chicken gravy' flavor!
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: This is working great so far
customer_reviews.text: This is working great so far. Started our cat on it in early February. He seems to be doing very well. He has had several blockages in the past. We are looking for a natural solution that will keep him stable and hopefully get him off of the prescription diet as I'm not a fan of the ingredients. I spoke to someone with the company for more information. He was very helpful and informative. Very pleased with this product so far. we will re-order. May 2017 Michael continues to do well. We have been able to take him off of the prescription CD food. I just wasn't very happy with the ingredients! This product is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Robin L Wengert

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! My Maine coon has had ongoing issues of bladder stones, urinary discomfort and urinating in places that were not his litter box. I noticed him feeling better after just two doses. 2 1/2 weeks later he,acts like a kitten again. He is no longer listless. He's bright eyes, bushy tailed and is his normal self! No more "accidents". I will continue to use this daily and I highly recommend it. I'll be keeping a supply on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Pc mills

customer_reviews.title: Helped My Pup
customer_reviews.text: I have a GSD puppy that was repeatedly getting UTIs. After the third trip in a row to the vet and several long bouts of medication, I did my research and found this product. I’ve been giving it to my pup since and she has yet to have another UTI. My vet gives this product the thumbs up, and even gives it to her cat with urinery tract issues. I highly recommend this product. One note: this product needs refrigeration after opening.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Kap

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but Effective
customer_reviews.text: My 16-year-old cat had been through 2 rounds of antibiotics for a bladder infection and it kept coming back. This product cleared it up in a few days. When I stopped using it, the infection came back. This time I'll keep dosing her for a few weeks. I use the eyedropper provided to place 1 ml. directly in her mouth and she accepts it without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D.

customer_reviews.title: amazing product
customer_reviews.text: my cat started to urinating outside her box and it kept getting worse then i found this on amazon within two days i begin to notice a difference at first i strted taking her and putting her in the litter box i done this every few hours well after about a week she started to going and using it on her own it works great i still give her at least one dose a week to keep any infections from hopefully reaccuring
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Cleared up bad infection within a week
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We adopted a dog about a month ago and they fixed him before they gave him to us. He came home with a bad bladder infection. Ordered this immediately and within a few days he was doing much better. Within a week, it was cleared up and had no more trouble. I added wet dog food to a bowl of water several times a day to get him going more and added this in. Will always keep on hand now.
customer_reviews.author: sarahp1000

customer_reviews.title: Has worked like a charm so far
customer_reviews.text: I started using this after the 3rd go around with urinary infection in my older male cat (struggling to urinate, blood in urine, etc.). Since I have been using it, he has not had a reinfection. I use it in wet food, faithfully, every single day! In fact, I have 7 cats, 5 of whom are males — so, I give it to all the boys, every single day as a preventative. (I’ve been doing this for about 6 months so far.)
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Give, Smell Could be Better, Product is Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I have several dogs that have kidney issues and when we use this product, it definitely seems to help the issues, which involve peeing indiscriminately in the house, which tends to make male family members angry. Our male dog will urinate on things, but only when he is "out of whack." Using this product helps him to essentially pull himself together and remember that he is not allowed to pee in the house and must go outside. The only real problem that we have with this product is the smell, because if we do not mask it sufficiently with food, which can sometimes be difficult, then the dogs will not eat their food and will not take this medicine.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie B.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product works!! My poor kitty had a UTI and was having a hard time peeing. I was in nursing school... Working hardley any hours so I couldn't afford a vet bill at the time. I tried this and 3 days later she was peeing normally in her litter box and was happy!! She does not like the taste and it smells terrible but it works like magic! I gave it to her as directed for 2 weeks and haven't needed to use it since. It's been about 6 months!! Very happy with this product! If your fur baby is showing signs of a UTI and you can't get him/her to the vet right away, I highly recommend trying this!!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Vets Recommendation for Dog’s Frequent UTIs
customer_reviews.text: My veternarian recommended that I add this to my pet’s daily regimen to help prevent UTIs. I simply use the dropper, that is attached to the bottle and functions as the lid, to drop 2.5mL of UroMAXX to my 20lb dog’s wet food once a day. Since beginning UroMAXX, my dog has not had bacteria present in her urine for the last two cultures. The smell is not particularly pleasant for humans, but my dog seems to be unbothered by its presence on her food.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I've got a sick cat and this stuff seems to be helping. It's easy to administer, and she doesn't seem to hate the flavor. She may still end up at the vet's office, but at least this supplement allowed me to figure out what was a problem with her digestive system, and what was something more serious. I'm grateful for this product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Thirdrail1

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby Blake would get a UTI once a month. He started to pee on his bed and out of the litter box. We knew that was not like him. Then we started to notice blood in his urine. We took him to the vet and it started to get expensive and nothing worked. Finally I looked on amazon and started to look into this. This is the best thing we could’ve bought for Blake. I ordered it and got it next day. Right away he got relief and was back to his self. I put it in his wet food once a day. He loves the flavor and he is a picky boy!
customer_reviews.author: Chin-gon

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase - Makes your dog sick
customer_reviews.text: We gave our dog 1.5 doses of this medication to treat a UTI. After the second serving, he started vomiting all over the house. He could not keep anything down in his stomach. He vomited 5 times in 3.5 hours. These were not small vomits - they were large vomits that appeared to completely empty his stomach. Every time we thought we were at the tail end of his vomiting, he would vomit again. We strongly recommend that if you suspect your dog has a UTI, you visit your vet and see what they recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cured the kitty
customer_reviews.text: Cat was unsuccessfully treated for uti. She was often trying hard to urinate and could only produce drops. After researching I suspected struvite Crystal's due to stress and eating cheaper dry cat food. I mixed this product in with a fork full of wet cat food and she gobbled it right up. Within a few days I saw improvement in her ability to pee. She begs for her Uromaxx treat every day!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Haugen

customer_reviews.title: Got my dog’s UTI’s under control...finally
customer_reviews.text: My Shih Tzu had three UTI’s in a year. Everytime, she was on an antibiotic for 30 days, plus the testing. It was getting expensive. She would not eat cranberry pills, I tried three different doggie versions. I got this, gave her a dropper full twice a day for three weeks. I just fill the dropper, shove it in her mouth and squeeze. Had her tested and her UTI was gone..no white blood cells and no bacteria. Now she gets it twice a week as a maintenance dose. No problems for about four months. This was a Godsend. Thank you. The vet even asked what I did. Now she recommends it to other UTI patients.
customer_reviews.author: BigDogsMom

customer_reviews.title: this is for my cat, not human consumption.... so
customer_reviews.text: The flavor? No thanks, but my lil Lady likes it. Never refuses the taste. The scent? Well, the litter box smells better after she has used it several days. Yes, easy to use. By the dropper full. Lil Lady has had trouble with UTI's all along. When I found this stuff, non-vet stuff, she has MUCH relief, but I give it to her daily now. She will not eat nibbles, hard stuff, so this is purrrrfect cause she won't eat nibbles for a healthy bladder.
customer_reviews.author: ElLois B

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy- It Really Worked for My 10 Year Old Cat
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old male cat Scruffy was having urinary issues and I was very stressed about taking him to the vet knowing that even if he was ok, the tests and meds would cost hundreds of dollars. Seeing all the positive reviews on Amazon, I decided to try Uromaxx. I just mix it with the liquid treat he loves nightly and he gulps it down. Within weeks, Scruffy was doing better, urinating more strongly. 3 months later he is back to normal and I am very happy. I highly recommend to any cat parent whose cat is suffering from urinary problems to try Uromaxx- it was a money saver for me.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very very important for my cat prone to UTI's
customer_reviews.text: My cat has had a very serious problem for most of his life. For many years we used "UT cat chews" from 1-800- PetMeds, (prescription silver pouch) and they worked well, preventing Mr. Buddy from vet visits. As he got older,(10 now) the cat chews became hard to chew and eat. I researched the active ingredients and matched them a few different products, and tried them. This product was the one that came out on top, and has been working for 6 months now. I can tell it works by the PH balance of his urine, and when Mr. Buddy visits his box to often when suffering.
customer_reviews.author: david smyers

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY HAPPY HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I have a Rumpie Manx named Bobbi who was having occurring bladder infections. I had to place her on antibiotic therapy daily to keep them under control. Then I read another persons post of this product and UroMAXX Urinary Tract. I stopped her antibiotics and started both of these on 10/26 and so far no bladder infection. I am so pleased and I know she is much more comfortable. I will most definitely buy more and stock up so I never run out. (This day she had been rolling in the dirt in our yard, she's so funny)
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lane

customer_reviews.title: They like to taste!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a maintenance and preventative alternative to prescription drugs from a veterinarian. Seems to be working I’ve only been using it for a short time but in conjunction with a change to only wet food it seems to be making a huge difference for both of my cats.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalMama

customer_reviews.title: Recommend and so thankful for this product
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this. Daughter has blue doberman who had had two surgies for struvite. He was on prescription food and kept losing weight and still would have small stream, blood in urine at times. This helped so much. He pees like he used too, isn't as prone to bladder infections and there is light at the end of the tunnel. We are exploring low oxilate dry food to go along with low oxilate wet foods. Hopefully this 4 year old boy can enjoy everyday. So thankful to have found this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Melson

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% sure this product cleared the UTI, but my pup doesn't have UTI anymore.
customer_reviews.text: My pup developed UTI and I had been spending so much money at the Vet that I wanted to see if I could avoid going back to them and cure it using an OTC medicine. After a few days on this her UTI cleared, I've kept her on it until the bottle was done. I'm not sure if finishing the bottle was the right thing to do but it's made her bladder control so much stronger, that I'm now considering keeping her on it. I'm not a 100% sure if was all this bottle. I was also giving her bladder supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Joe A

customer_reviews.title: Stinks but Works
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 Shih Tzu dogs and the 2 girls get frequent UTI’s. After countless vet trips & vet bills I started to search for a resolution which led me to this product. I’m not gonna lie this stuff stinks really bad & my pups don’t like it but it does seem to help my girl dogs! I split their daily dose in two and give in the morning and at night and in a couple days their urine frequency improved! I am a believer and now just giving a maintaince dose once a day in hopes to keep UTI’s away!
customer_reviews.author: ThatWorks4Me

customer_reviews.title: I am a dog breeder and I can tell you that this works just as good as anything to that would give you
customer_reviews.text: This works on my three month old female puppy that have a UTI. No drugs necessary! I gave her double the dose suggested on the bottle. I gave her the dose on the bottle in the morning and in the evening. Once a day was not enough to have an effect. And I used it for 3 weeks to be sure the problem was solved. I am a dog breeder and I can tell you that this works just as good as anything to that would give you.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!! Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My cat was spending all night and morning trying to urinate with no luck. Being a Sunday the vet was not open and everything I read about it online was terrifying so when I saw this product I figured it was worth a try. Thank goodness for same day delivery! After 2 doses one last night and a second this morning he was able to go without any effort. I’m going to give him a few more doses and see if he is still on the mend this week. At the moment he seems happy and comfortable. I will never not have this in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Bgirl

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I took my cat to the vet and found out she had crystals. They put her on prescription wet food that was expensive I did it for two weeks and started reading ALOT. Found out that any wet food is better than dry kibble. After a month on uromaxx and wet food and I added water to the wet food to get a good flush going she was clear. As soon as I stopped the uromaxx she started to pee outside the box again. So uromaxx every day!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Nelson

customer_reviews.title: My cat is 18 and was suffering from a bladder ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat is 18 and was suffering from a bladder infection. He would pee a a quarter sized amount every 20 minutes and every time there would be a blood clot present. I gave him 1ML in his wet food every morning. I noticed it said it could be administered straight into the mouth, I did this but he threw it up not even a minute later. 4 days later and he was infection free and peeing regular! I was so relieved.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: Helped my pup from sprinkling pee as he walked
customer_reviews.text: I got this with the hope that it'd help with my 6 month old pup from peeing a little as he walked sometimes. I followed the instructions, giving him the recommended amount and spreading it out over all his meals. After a little over a week, it stopped! Now I add it to his food maybe a couple times a week and I haven't had any walking pees in over a month.
customer_reviews.author: Usakiia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended this for our cats elevated bun/phosphorus due to a treatment for FIP. Within 1-2 weeks was normal, all natural supplement!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L. Love

customer_reviews.title: So Glad I Tried UroMAXX
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable how quickly UroMAXX worked. I am extremely grateful for how quickly this worked, by the second day! No more frequent urination, and strong urine. My chihuahua has, rather had, frequent UTI's. I finally have something that works, and is safe. This is peace of mind, knowing I am giving her something safe. I also had a question for the company, and received a response today on Sunday. Have never had customer service like that. Thank you so much to the makers of UroMAXX. I would give 10 stars if possible. A forever customer in Texas.
customer_reviews.author: EWTX

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 9 year old Shih Tzu who was in the beginning stages of a UTI. She is very prissy and never has accidents but she started to have them quite often. After reading the reviews I decided to give this a try before taking her to the vet and spending $400 like I did the last time. By the 3rd day her urine was clear and she was no longer having accidents. The Uromaxx really works!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: My cat had a UTI and she does not do well at the vet so I was desperate and thought to try this product. It was PERFECT! It helped my cat within a week. I would recommend this to anyone who has a pet with the same issue. I gave the dosage directly to my cats mouth instead of in her food or water because she could smell and taste it and then turned her nose up to it so like a kid I had to hold her and give her the meds in a quick squirt into her mouth. She didn’t care for the taste but it really does work! No joke.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie jones

customer_reviews.title: Works so good!
customer_reviews.text: Thought my barn cat was on the verge of death but after a week of giving him this stuff he is like new. He was barely peeing and trying every 5 minutes with blood tinged urine. Since using this he’s back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Michele S.

customer_reviews.title: My dog has no symptoms whatsoever and I am pleased to say that I will be purchasing this product ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog was suffering from recurrent urinary tract infections until I started giving her this product. It takes a few weeks to start working so be patient because it works! My dog has no symptoms whatsoever and I am pleased to say that I will be purchasing this product again. She loves the taste and the bottle has lasted a long time. No more spending hundreds of dollars at the vets office. Thanks! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: This Product Really Works
customer_reviews.text: This product really works. We have four cats. The cats pee in the sinks and unfortunately, occasionally on the floor. The urine smell gets unbearably strong. Who can afford to take a cat to the vet every time it has a UTI? Internet searching led us to this product. After two weeks of directed use, the cat urine has no odor. And the cats seem to like the taste. And I do not smell cat urine in the sink when I'm brushing my teeth. A miracle! My old, dog who can't walk had urine that smelled so strong it would take your breath away. This product cleared it up almost overnight.
customer_reviews.author: TerrellR

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do anything.
customer_reviews.text: My elderly cat has been on this supplement for almost a year now. It hasn't made any difference. She has occasional accidents in her sleep, and the frequency of these has not been decreased at all. Back to the vet we go...
customer_reviews.author: Pony

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it works
customer_reviews.text: Took the cat to the vet because she was peeing often with vary small pees. He gave her an antibiotic which seemed to work, but weeks later she had the same issue. Found this on Amazon and have been using it everyday for her with no more small pee issues. We mix it with her canned wet food once a day at level 1 2x.
customer_reviews.author: AZJOE

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My little pom dog was peeing in his sleep. I tried Apple Cider Vinegar and that kind of helped. BUT when I started using this within a few days he stopped peeing in his sleep and symptoms are gone. I think he had a UTI. I will continue to give him this daily.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle E.

customer_reviews.title: ACTUALLY WORKS !!! MAINE COON BOYS HAPPY !
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product . Our boys love this stuff and it has made a world of difference in their bladder difficulties ( when mixed with WET food ) . Moisture, too many carb fillers ( corn ), and garbage ingredients in general is a big issue in the cat food industry . Very happy this stuff exists and helps our cats immensely . They are no longer suffering in silence and peeing like champs ; ) Thank you for making this stuff !
customer_reviews.author: Totoro11

customer_reviews.title: Cat UTI gone!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product with my cat for about a year now and I can see a immediate difference. If I’ve skipped a couple of days he will begin to develop a UTI and within a day or two I see it clear up when I incorporate it back into his food. It’s easy to use, I just drizzle it over any wet or dry cat food and he eats it right up. Great product, I would highly recommend this to anyone that needs to help their dog/cat's kidneys work better.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the antibiotic rollercoaster
customer_reviews.text: Just over a year ago I adopted a shelter cat who had a severe peeing problem. I got some Uromaxx from my holistic vet and it helped immensely. My vet and I wanted to avoid antibiotics at all costs, and this worked just as well or better. I keep a bottle on hand to add a few drops to the food keep my cat(s) free of urinary tract issues, though I would not recommend using it if the kidneys are normal. I bought it because my cat peed inappropriately recently. Great for cats that are prone to infections.
customer_reviews.author: Queen S

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was literally a life-saver for my cat. After repeated cycles of urinary crystals/pain meds/IV fluids costing hundreds of dollars every 4-6 weeks,and facing a choice of major surgery or putting him down, I started searching for answers other than the ones my vet provided. After reading great reviews, I purchased UroMaxx. I called for dosing advice and the representative spent a great deal of time with me on the phone, getting a thorough background on the problems we were having. He then recommended a schedule for the first 30 days, and for maintenance afterwards. We have not had a problem since, and that was over two years ago. I hope I never have to be without Uromaxx!
customer_reviews.author: Lucyg

customer_reviews.title: Saves my cat’s life (and my sheets)
customer_reviews.text: My little girl kitty has idiopathic feline cystitis, which means she is prone to getting UTIs. UroMAXX is pretty much the only thing that keeps her healthy. She is stubborn as heck, so the only way we can get her to take it is to drop it into her mouth directly, but hey, it’s better than her peeing all over our bed.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Fam

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to wait and see if it worked before submitting a review. My male cat has always had issues with bladder infections. This last time it was very stubborn. He would bleed. Frustrated and fed up with high vet Bill's, I decided to try. It took about 10 days and he was back to normal with no crying or blood, or frequency. Very happy with this product. I have been giving it to both cats now about once or twice a week for maintenance in their soft food. My cats seem to like the taste as they have never fussed over it. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Photochef

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff for not a lot of $
customer_reviews.text: My one cat had crystals Last year so I thought I would try different supplements on top of Rx food For him. I had bought a smaller bottle of drops feom another brand but wanted to try this because it seemed to last longer. I still Have a lot In the bottle. I give him about half the syringe per two times of wet food feeding a day. It works best with wet food to mix in and mixes in well. He doesn’t remind or is out off by the scent and he eats his food so I’m guessing it tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: Janel MH

customer_reviews.title: Don't know if it helps yet....Will update soon....
customer_reviews.text: Just started this on one of our female rescue cats who is experiencing recurrent UTI's. Hoping this will prevent the problem. Began along with Purina One UTI dry food. (She hates the can.) Can't tell if it helps, yet. Too soon. Will update as time passes. Since she's had a UTI once a month now we should see if this does help or not soon. She does hate the taste and we have to administer it to her directly. She won't eat the food if we mix it in and considering how much she needs, it wouldn't work that way anyway.
customer_reviews.author: University DocTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works
customer_reviews.text: This has really seemed to help my 18 year old cat. She kept getting uti’s so after her last one when she was done with antibiotics I started her on Uromaxx it took about 3 weeks but now she is acting like she did a few years ago. She is eating better to and the best thing no more utis so far. I highly recommend trying this if you have a senior cat with bladder or kidney issues.
customer_reviews.author: Laila E.

customer_reviews.title: For cat with frequent UTIs
customer_reviews.text: My cat has FLUTD and gets UTIs and blockages easily. I keep this on hand for those times when he has a flare up. A few doses of this, and he is back to normal. He hates it, and I have to swaddle him with a towel and force him to take it, but I've never had a cat like any medicine given them. It works!!! I always have some on hand for whenever he needs it! If you have a male cat - you need this! And feed wet food!!!
customer_reviews.author: lovemyboys

customer_reviews.title: seems to be working but slow
customer_reviews.text: I am seeing progress after one month of use. it is slow but at least my cat is getting better. She used to go to litter box very often and every time the pee contains little pinky color, and almost every time she pee outside of the litter box even though she is inside the box (raising her butt high). now after 1 month of this she still couldnt finish pee in one visit sometimes but the frequency is greatly reduced, and pinky color is rare, probably once per day or in two days.
customer_reviews.author: Chenny

customer_reviews.title: HOORAY!  IT REALLY WORKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My male cat was licking himself down there and would pee a little every time he would bend down. I don’t know if it was just incontinence or some other urinary related issue but uromaxx took care of it. This stuff WORKS people and I love that it’s natural and not some prescribed medication. Every cat owner should have a bottle of this on hand. After seeing how well this worked, I always keep a bottle on hand. It’s so easy to just put some in their food, i try to give some to my cats every week just to keep their urinary tract healthy and prevent any unpleasant vet visits.
customer_reviews.author: Adv64

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! It has reduced UTI’s in my paralyzed cat dramatically. I put the recommended amount for my cat’s weight and add it to her soft food. It tells you on the bottle weight to amount needed. She eats twice a day so I dived the dose between her two meals. Refrigerate after opening per directions.
customer_reviews.author: Candace D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Our cat seemed to like the flavor/scent. I just drizzled dosage on his dry food (he gets fed 3x daily in smaller amounts). He seems to be doing much better. No more blood. Will keep giving him this each day for a month and may be every other day after. Hopefully keeping him on this will help for future.
customer_reviews.author: jnjf

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used this on 2 of my cats, after feeding. And.both cats got sick and threw up. Tried adding it to their food, they ate it just fine, but still threw up shortly after. Can't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Older cat with occasional difficulty in the litter box, vet decided a sort of nervous urethra issue, gave medication to relax that.. but going forward his difficulties become chronic with small pees. I had tried Tinkle Tonic and UTI+ and cranberry etc. He started on Uromaxx a month ago, and now, not every time but often, he has these enormous healthy easy pees after which he frolics like a youngster. I'm sticking with this.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Really seems to work
customer_reviews.text: My son's finicky cat was struggling with urinary tract issues. So many good reviews of this product, so we tried it. He loves the taste and within a week things seemed to settle down for him. Gave it daily for about 10 days and now give it 2 or 3 times a week. Just one thing to note -- it needs to be refrigerated after opening!
customer_reviews.author: ohgypsywoman

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to make issue worse
customer_reviews.text: My cat wouldn't go near this because of the disagreeable odor, so I had to restrain her and put the dropper in her mouth. Seems to have made the problem worse, as she continued to pee in the house in new places as well as the old, but that could have been the stress from being restrained and medicated. Vet said she had a UTI. Please don't use if your cat is in distress. UTIs are painful and can lead to complications if untreated. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Quiet Nature Lover

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKS :)
customer_reviews.text: 8-9yr old male cat having UTIs almost every 3 weeks. Vet prescribed very expensive food to replace his everyday kibble at home. He didn’t like the prescribed food and continued to have UTIs, growling and licking himself after using the litter box. Found this product and he has been good ever since. He gets 1ml with his wet food every 3 days. I know u can give it to cats daily but he doesn’t seem to need it everyday at this time. Definitely worth a try if you don’t have money to go to the vet every month
customer_reviews.author: Andreaandrew83

customer_reviews.title: UROMAX urinary tract stuff for cats
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to work, I put it on my cat “zipper’s” food and she eats her food no problem. I haven’t had a problem since the doctor visit (the vet rx was the same thing, maybe stronger ) so i keep putting this on her food for a month now (when I remember) anyway. My cat is doing great and has put back on her normal weight. (She really lost her appetite and lost weight due to bladder infection) don’t mess around get your cat to a vet if she doesn’t eat.
customer_reviews.author: tresea larson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Treatment For My Dog's UTI
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 days my dog stopped urinating all over the house, and her pain stopped completely! She still has an odor in that area, but it is not nearly as bad as it was before using the UroMAXX. She has more energy, and is better than her old self! This is a miracle product for UTI's! It saved me a lot of money, I didn't have to take her to the vet. She has been using the medication now for about a month. They don't like the taste, so I put it on eggs or veggies for her. This is well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara55

customer_reviews.title: An Effective Way to Manage Repeat Urinary Tract Issues
customer_reviews.text: Discouraged by numerous veterinary visits during which I was told that my cat could develop antibiotic resistance when repeatedly treated for UTI symptoms, I looked for another approach. Uromaxx, used daily, has kept our cat healthy and comfortable. I add a dropper of the liquid to a couple of teaspoons of canned cat food and she laps it up without fail.
customer_reviews.author: Ski93

customer_reviews.title: Very happy cat lady.
customer_reviews.text: I used pretty kitty litter recently because I felt like my older kitty was meowing differently (I know it sounds strange). Turns out the acidity in her urine was abnormal which means something is going on in her kidneys or it’s a UTI (or both). I bought this to save a vet trip and I saw an immediate difference in her demeanor by the second day. I mix it in her morning wet food and it’s worked like a charm. Very happy cat lady. :D
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: "Science is our strength" what science?
customer_reviews.text: After using two months in my cat, cannot say if there is any improvement . The advertisement touts that science is their strength, but I see no reference to any scientific studies . Have veterinarians provided reviews on this product or these extracts?
customer_reviews.author: Yada yada

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I cant say for sure about the flavor or scent as my dog would have to do that. So I am going to guess on her reaction to it. Flavor is strong and she doesn't like it. I dont think there is any other flavors to mask the cranberry. No scent that I detect, but I am sure she detects one, based on her glares she gives me when it's time for this supplement. It is a quality product and I am glad it exists, my dog refuses all the other brands of chews.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: I wish I'd found this product sooner
customer_reviews.text: My cats don't have an issue with the smell or taste. I mix it into a small amount of soft food and a bit of water morning and at night. usually by day 3 the constant in and out of the litter box stops and the kitty is calm and feeling much better. I usually continue giving it for a day or two then maybe once or twice a week for maintenance especially for the kitty that gets UTI often. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for any cat or dog owners medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5lb Papillon is prone to bladder infections and has had one too many health issues due to her itty bitty fragile size.. I hate putting her on antibiotics but this last time the homeopathic regime I usually use wasn’t working. I ordered this, started her on it the minute it arrived, by the end of the 2nd day I noticed she was feeling better, a little more energy, not so lethargic and had an appetite. By the 4th day she was 110%! I swear by this product. She’s getting older and I was truly worried she wasn’t going to get better. I couldn’t be happier with this product
customer_reviews.author: BohemianMum

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: My cat suffered urinary tract infections nonstop since he was five years old, and to complicate matters he had to be sedated each time he visited the Vet, because my cat is very aggressive. I learned about UroMaxx about three years ago and since then my cat stopped having urinary tract infections, he is now 15-yrs old. I highly recommend this supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Elkins

customer_reviews.title: It Worked Fast
customer_reviews.text: Our cat was urinating where she shouldn't and going into her litter box about every 15mns. I bought this as I assumed it was a type of UTI and we were going to be going on vacation. Within 2 days she was back to normal. No potty issues. I continue to give her this as a preventive, as she loves it, mixed in her wet food.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Just what my cat needed
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6 year old male, neutered, long-haired cat who has had problems with recurring UTI's. I hate to have to put him on antibiotics every time so I looked for a natural solution and found this product. He actually was experiencing UTI symptoms when this came in the mail. I put it on his breakfast, soft pate style food, and he didn't hesitate to eat it so I'm assuming it tastes/smells good. He does lick his butt so that bar is low, but he seems to like it. I've been using it daily for a few weeks now and so far we are problem-free. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Warner

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my min pin!
customer_reviews.text: This product really worked! My min pin had a bladder infection which was causing secondary diarrhea. After the first dose, which I administered directly into her mouth, she began to feel noticeably better. By the next morning, I was able to cancel her vet appointment. Her diarrhea was gone and she was urinating as usual. It was as though the last two days of sickness had never happened. I now give her a maintenance dose of every other day. There is no way she would ever eat it in her food...very finicky. So, I use a dropper to squeeze it directly into her mouth. Her frequent bladder infections are no more.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Perillo

customer_reviews.title: Half the Cost of Getting This From the Vet
customer_reviews.text: I had been purchasing UroMAXX Urinary Tract from my vet, who originally prescribed the product to address my cat's bladder issues. The last time I began to get low, I thought I'd try Amazon rather than having to take my cat into the vet. (It's so stressful for her, I hate doing it unless it's absolutely necessary.) I was surprised (well, maybe not really) to find it on Amazon for fully HALF the cost of getting the exact product and size from the vet's.
customer_reviews.author: Elise in Palm Springs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that is so difficult to give meds to, it takes 3 or more people at the vet just for shots. I can't even get flea meds on him. If I hide meds in his food, he always knows and wont eat it. So he had the signs of a uti, I was so worried about giving him meds. He loves this stuff, I'm amazed!! I pour it over his breakfast every morning. he licks it all up and best part, it actually works. all his symptoms are gone, he's using litter box again too. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: This helped!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has FLUTD. The antibiotics prescribed to her costs me over $75 for 5-7 day period. This time it didn't help. She was constantly trying to pee, but nothing would come out. It was a weekend and her vet was closed. I looked on Amazon and searched for cat UTI medication. This popped up and had good reviews...plus it's all natural. I decided to try it and paid a little extra for same day shipping. I'm glad I did! I gave her 1ml directly into her mouth at night. The following morning, she peed! This stuff works. I give it to her every day. $27.00 for 6 months is a great deal. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. A.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my cat!
customer_reviews.text: Great medicine, my cat feels much better even after the 1st dose. She was constantly going in and out of the litter box , not urinating too much. She would spot around the house too . This helps her to go to the litter box less frequently and urinate Regularly . She stopped spotting. The only thing is you have to give it to them everyday, it’s meant to help the animal regulate naturally.
customer_reviews.author: Kristeana Gale

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as it was recommended from various cat forums I visited
customer_reviews.text: My cat suddenly went from peeing twice a day, normal-sized clumps to a small clump every other day. I scheduled an appointment with the vet, but in the meantime, I bought this as it was recommended from various cat forums I visited. Two days later after a 1oz serving in the AM/PM feedings, my cat was back to normal. I still went through with the vet exam which included an x-ray and urinalysis ($$!!), but he was normal. So, if your cat's not bleeding or straining to pee, try this in the days before the vet visit. If it's more serious, please don't neglect to take your kitty to the vet.
customer_reviews.author: MDS

customer_reviews.title: Like that both the cat and the dog can use
customer_reviews.text: Both our cat and dog have bladder issues so having something that helps them both is nice. The dog is not as crazy about the taste as a chicken one for dogs we were giving her but she does take it when mixed onto her food. The cat likes it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: ALgirl

customer_reviews.title: Don’t miss a dose and keep them on it for life
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs and 3 cats . One of my cats started urinating blood after a round of antibiotics he’s been on this ever since once a day in his wet food haven’t had a problem since it’s been 4 yrs . Then my dog started straining and having accidents in the house . I after antibiotics and steroids nothing worked so I started her in this once a day and thank god she’s better it’s been over a year . I swear by this product . It may seem like a lot to spend but it’s worth it to not have to have your pets suffer and possible have an expensive surgery
customer_reviews.author: Gumby

customer_reviews.title: Fixes urinary problems for cats
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bottle I have purchased for two cats (two different households) and both cats are doing much better. Fast and prompt shipping from customer. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: Really works, saved me a trip and money
customer_reviews.text: Twice in one year I brought my cat Foxy to the vet for urination issues. One time they gave her antibiotics and fluid, second time gave me special food. My brother had a cat with the same issue (bladder stones) and he recommended this product. I have used it for 2 years now, and the last recheck at the vet showed nothing in her bladder. I don't give it to her every day because in the beginning she vomited a bit. She gets it every other/every third day and it still keeps her from having any extra vet appointments. I don't know about the flavor, other than she does eat it in the mornings on her wet food. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work and cat hates it
customer_reviews.text: Used this for several months and our cat hated it every single time. We used another supplement as well and that one did not bother him like this one did. It is not easy to get out either once the level reaches below the dropper. Had to pour it into another vessel half way through to get the rest. He ended up getting fully blocked after about 4 months on this so we stopped using it completely.
customer_reviews.author: KAP

customer_reviews.title: Works Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Although my dog knows when her food smells different we have learned how to “hide” the smell in her food & she gobbles it up. I’ve now purchased bottle number 2. The first bottle was helping her but I ran out & had to get another bottle. Her bleeding has now completely stopped. She was bleeding so bad she was having clots but now she’s back to normal. My dog is 15 yrs old so she’s no pup, this stuff has worked miracles for her! I will continue to buy this stuff for as long as she lives.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Helped my kitty!
customer_reviews.text: Our poor kitty was peeing blood. We took him to the vet and this was one of the things she suggested we try (after a urine test and several expensive antibiotics/medicines). The blood cleared up in just a few days and he didn't seem to mind the taste at all (I mixed it in with wet food and a little bit of water). Definitely a budget friendly option to help our kitty. I'll continue to put this in his food to avoid another flare up! Also, with the dosage and the size of the bottle, this will last a long time. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Dog is peeing again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my husky pit was taking forever to urinate, he would only urinate in small amount and it would take him forever, wasn't sure what was wrong and i knew for sure i couldn't afford a vet visit. So i decided to risk it and buy this and in one day he started to urinate fine again.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisferreal

customer_reviews.title: taste like catbox
customer_reviews.text: Witchie WuWu told me "it does not taste like chicken"...."it taste like cat box and if you try and put that crap in mouth again you'll draw back a bloody stump !" so all in all, Witchie wins---her decsions are usually correct and my hand is torn up from the floor up !" so no I will not be being your product again. thanks, Babz & Witchie WuWu
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Cleared problem crystals!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is wonderful!!! My cat has suffered with urinary tract infections and crystals in her bladder for at least a year now. I switched her to a food that helped her, but made my other two cats throw up all the time. I switched food to something that didn't bother any of the three bellies, but made the crystals come back, causing a urinary tract infection. This was my last-ditch effort to clear up my kitty's health. After just 3 weeks, she is completely free of crystals and much happier!!
customer_reviews.author: KJ Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Make sure its a urinary tract infection
customer_reviews.text: My dog Bella passed away 3 days ago...not because of the liquid, because my stupid vet said her cough was nothing. months later she had congestive heart failure and died in my arms. she was only 9
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine A. Stegemann

customer_reviews.title: ONLY THING THAT HAS STOPPED UTIs IN MY BEAGLE
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended this to me because my sweet beagle had chronic UTIs. We were at the vet every other month. She had a surgery to try and help reduce the frequency, was on special food...nothing worked. He recommended this and, knock wood, she hasn't had an infection since. We have been using this now for almost two years and I love it! I recommend it to everyone who mentions UTI problems in their dogs because it works so well! A lifesaver for my sweet girl. No more prescription food and no more UTIs!!
customer_reviews.author: JRAS

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My 18 year old cat was showing signs of a UTI, she was going to the litter every few minutes and wasn't really leaving anything but droplets. Also she'd be in the litter for minutes at a time and meowing while in there. Spoke with the people from UroMaxx after finding this through a search of my cats symptoms. The person I spoke with said to increase the dosage for the first thirty days and that I would see results in 3 days. Well he couldn't have been more right, in 3 days my cat was back to normal routine and I took the advice and picked up the ArthriMaxx as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gamma82

customer_reviews.title: no more bladder problems in cat and dog
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few products that I recommend frequently and without reservation. My Lhasa Apso and my neutered cat, both males, had an early history of bladder issues. I have been giving it daily to them both for years now and they have had no recurrence of infections or stones. I just put a dropper full on their food every morning. This has been a great, natural solution to a potentially deadly problem. I almost never write reviews but this is one product I am very grateful to have found.
customer_reviews.author: GoldCrow

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for urinary issues in cats
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! I have a 7 yr old rescue cat. I noticed her urine was smelling stronger. Within 1-2 days the urine smell was on present on her backside even after bathing her. I read this could be a sign of a UTI so i found this product on amazon and decided to give it a try due to its high ratings. One day after using and the smell is gone. She doesnt mind the taste either. Im very glad i made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: You can avoid expensive vet visits with this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My four year old cat has had a couple of really bad UTIs in the last few months and this product has been nothing short of a miracle for her. I have avoided expensive visits to the vet because of UroMAXX. When she starts having symptoms, I take away all dry kibble and feed only freeze-dried (re-hydrated) cat food with UroMAXX added to it a couple of times a day. Each time, I saw improvement of symptoms in a couple of days and they are usually completely gone by day 4 or 5. Thank you so much for making this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Our dog recently began having a foul smell in her urination
customer_reviews.text: Our dog recently began having a foul smell in her urination. We knew something was just not right. We didn't have a chance to take her to the vet, so we decided to give this a try first. We used it on her food mixed also with Salmon oil so she would enjoy the taste. After one week of using this daily, she is back to normal. The foul smell is gone and her urine is clear again. It saved us money and it worked!! Very happy dog, happy owners!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Courville

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I read the reviews prior to purchase and was convinced this would work for my cat. My cat's urine smelled horrible- like vinegar, figured she had a UTI. After day 3 the vinegar urine smell disappeared & my bathroom no longer smells like cat urine. As for my cat, her fur went from dry to silkey, this stuff rocks! I give it to my cat orally with someone holding her. She is not a fan, but will not eat her food if I mix it. She is VERY touchy about her food.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It was amazing
customer_reviews.text: The litter box in my house had such a strong ammonia smell I had a hard time cleaning it. I started using Uromaxx and the next day my daughter said she could tell a difference. My cat was using the litterbox every few minutes and within a couple of days she was back to regular usage. I put it in her food and she licks up the bowl. I am very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Stevens

customer_reviews.title: It is disgusting tasting. I actually tasted it myself
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. It made our cat very sick. It is disgusting tasting. I actually tasted it myself. Our cat vomited for days after giving it to her.
customer_reviews.author: wendy l

customer_reviews.title: Have used for two animals so far!
customer_reviews.text: This homeopathic treatment is a great find! I have older cats and one of them started developing UTIs. The vet recommended changing their food and also looking at supplementing with something OTC for more frequent issues. This has really been a game changer. The moment (cats pee in sinks if they have a UTI - who knew?) we see that one of our cats has an issue we give them one dose of the supplement. They usually feel better the next day. Syringe is easy to use - dosing guidelines are clear - and it has kept my pets out of the vet's office.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia D. Young

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work out
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 8 yr old cat who has been in to the vet for a uti. I read all the reviews thought this would be helpful along w changing all her food to uti friendly. The label looked impressive. Unfortunately the flavor was not accepted there was no food or treat I could disguise this within. I even tasted a drop myself and found it very unpleasant that I elected not to oral syringe Push this. Sadly this will be donated and I’ll try another method.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: UroMAXX Urinary Tract, Kidney & Bladder Formula for Cats and Dogs, 6 oz Bottle
product_meta.description: UroMAXX has established itself as a reliable Animal Nutrition Product company for 15 years and we are literally the only company providing a Liquid Supplement for both Cats and Dogs who suffer from Urinary Tract Infections, or Kidney and Bladder infections. Numerous Veterinarians are calling UroMAXX the “breakthrough” product for treating acute and chronic cystitis, hematuria (blood in the urine), and a host of other problems that are associated with UTD conditions. If you love your pets as much as we love ours, you’ll be pleased to hear that UroMAXX may also help to discourage struvite/ oxalate crystal formation, providing additional relief for your furry friends. Many other supplements use cranberry juice in their formulas, but UroMAXX takes it a step further and uses Pure Cranberry Extract and Glucosamine HCL to help nourish and strengthen the Urinary Tract Layer Lining. Our Proprietary Blend of herbal extracts is unlike any other on the market, which is why it provides the best results! Designed to be administered daily, our formula can actually prevent UTI problems from reoccurring and even occurring in the first place. Prevention and damage control are the key to solving UTI problems and UroMAXX has been recognized by our satisfied customers to do just that! Read Our Fantastic Reviews! Our Liquid Formula can be used as a safe additive to specialty diets and with regular use it may even eliminate the need for specialty diets to begin with. Easy to give, just drop directly on your pet’s wet or dry food. And if your pet is easy to handle, it can be administered directly into the mouth with our dropper. Full 100% palatability guarantee! Buy from the Most Trusted Pet Company for Over 15 Years! You’ll notice the difference our products make in your pet’s life and you’ll be coming back for years to come! Shop around our storefront to see the other great products we offer!
feature_bullets: MADE IN U.S.A.- U.S. Sourced human grade and U.S. Pharmacopeia grade ingredients Only; 15 Years of Reliable Production and Counting
ALL NATURAL- Unique cold processed powerful liquid formula ensures full potency; No Sugar, Starch, Salt, Yeast, Soy, Wheat or Milk

OUR SOLUTION IS HERE- Antibiotic resistance is a concerning epidemic with the medical health field in humans and our pets.  If this is your first or second time using them for a problematic Urinary tract infection, it's time you give uromaxx a try NOW! Uromaxx has been found to work where antibiotics have not
QUICK RELIEF- Provides relief for your furry friends suffering from Urinary Tract Disease/ Infection as well as Kidney and Bladder Infections.
SPECIAL BLEND- Containing Cranberry Juice Extract, Glucosamine-HCL, and Vitamin C mixes easy with wet and dry food; can also be administered directly into your pet's mouth
